definition: ترتيب tartīb pl. -āt order, arrangement, array; sequence, succession; make-up, setup; layout (of a complex, e.g., of houses); organization; preparation, arrangement, provision, measure, step; rite of administering a sacrament (Chr.) │بالرترتيب one by one, in proper succession; من غيرترتيب disorderly, in confusion
